Name: LU 16 - Landmarks, Brownsville Arts Center and Apartments, Brooklyn (C 240030 ZMK)
Title: Application number C 240030 ZMK (Brownsville Arts Center and Apartments) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17d, eliminating from within an existing R6 District a C2-3 District, changing from an R6 District to an R7A District, changing from a C4-3 District to an R7A District and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
